comments:

It doesn't work for my own project, but it also doesn't work for the org.eclipse.gmf.examples.eclipsecon.library project.
Using Eclipse 3.3 + GMF 2.0

The workaround for restoring the items form both lists ('Nodes' and 'Links') is to go Back to the 4th page, click the 'Load" button and go to the 5th page again - all the items are back in the lists.
